item.title: By: Rob Sullivan
item.dc:creator: Rob Sullivan
item.description: I am having endless amusement at how many blog posts are needed to explain how to shut down the operating system or basic usability.
item.content:encoded: I am having endless amusement at how many blog posts are needed to explain how to shut down the operating system or basic usability.

item.title: By: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
